page.title: 13My house (1)
page.content: The house I live in is detached. I think it is owner occupied. Upstairs there are four bedrooms, an airing cupboard and one bathroom. Downstairs there is one toilet, a kitchen, one small cupboard which is used to store brooms dustpan and brush etc. and a dining room. We have a fairly big dining room. We use one half of the dining room where the computer is kept and all the accessories for it. The other half is where the T.V.is kept and the three piece suite. We have a garage with a yellow door. We also have two gardens- a front garden and a back garden which each have flowers growing there and we have a tiny garden where the rabbits are kept. We also have a shed, a green house and a pond. The pond has a fountain and fish in there. THAT'S MY HOUSE.
